name: St. Louis-Marie Grignion de Montfort

locations.description: Missionary priest and founder of the Montfort Missionaries

summary: Louis-Marie Grignion de Montfort was a French Roman Catholic priest and missionary. He is known for his devotion to the Blessed Virgin Mary and for founding the Company of Mary (Montfort Missionaries) and the Daughters of Wisdom. His writings on Marian devotion, particularly 'True Devotion to Mary' and 'The Secret of the Rosary', have had a profound influence on Catholic spirituality. He traveled throughout France preaching parish missions and promoting devotion to Mary and the Rosary.
